dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Hooh... Yeah, that's me. The first mate of the Twinhook Pirates. What, want an autograph?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg:
Hey~ Good morning. Oh, talk'll have to wait.
Right, lads! I want a report! How are our 'side jobs' doing~?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Lunch? On a ship? Lunch ain't a thing in the life of a sailorman, friend. Just eat when you're starting to feel peckish.
If you steal from our food storage, though... Now that's asking to get tied to the mast.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: It's getting late... And I can feel the call of alcohol from outside. Hook, you bastard. Where the hell are you? I'd love to get out for a bit, but I've got responsibilities.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Mermaid Perfume ain't such a lucrative venture. Gotta branch out like a kraken. Intel, Whale oil, or even people!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: What, we're poking too many hornet's nests? Well, that's just the life of a pirate. ... Besides, we've got somebody looking out for us.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Hey, wait up. Wait up. Hostages? A bit crude to call them that, nah? We're just having... very important guests over for business. And we're just putting up some of that tough guy act.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Uh huh. Yep yep. This is a threat. Come with us, or I'll give your skull a new hole to breathe out of. No, I'm not gonna shoot you. Bullets are pricey, y'know. Instead... lemme introduce you to my hook right here.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Now just go in ahead and rest up in that shipping container, 'kay?
Wait~ Tsk tsk! Why are you shuddering? You'll have plenty of time for that once we get you situated nicely in that cold storage. Don't waste your strength now~

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Sigh~ Doin' this kinda boring desk job on a portship... Makes me miss the days Hook and I used to sail the high Lakes, looting treasures, ships...

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: You wanna work together? Hmm~ Well, sure. I think you'll do. Well, then... let's make this work.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Need a first mate?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Fine, I'll do it myself.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I'm busy. Go bother one of my underlings.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I'll poke you a new breathing hole.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Flapping like a torn sail, huh?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: What...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Heh, that was nothing.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I-I can't die like this... The M-Middle will...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Heh, easier than picking open a treasure chest.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: What'd I say? I'm not good with this kinda thing.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Another day, another profitable business. Let's take some of 'em as our guests.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Well, we wiped the floor with them. That doesn't leave much for our... 'business'. Hm, let's check their wallets and see what they've got.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Haah... I got your faces and names... Once the Big Sister gets here, you're finished. All of you.
